description: A door that can open and close

open.description: Forcefully open this door, regardless of player position

close.description: Forcefully close this door, regardless of player position

opening.description: The door has started to open

closing.description: The door has started to close

stayOpen.description: Whether this door should remain open until closed via I/O

preventPlayerOpen.description: Whether this door should open when the player approaches
